summary: REQ-43 appears implemented in the Seller Dashboard overflow menu by forcing a white dropdown background with contrasting text and adding border/shadow styling, while keeping menu items and navigation/logout behavior unchanged. However, additional unrelated changes were made to URL param utilities and project summary/state files that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added URL parameter parsing and sessionStorage persistence utilities unrelated to Seller Dashboard overflow menu styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change overflow menu dropdown styling; no URL parameter or session persistence work was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository meta/summary files (frontend file summaries and project_state) unrelated to the overflow menu styling request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request any documentation/state summary updates.
